com.robsonmartins.acaas

Class AcaaSApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • org.restlet.Application
        • com.robsonmartins.acaas.AcaaSApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class AcaaSApplication
extends org.restlet.Application
    Aplicacao REST do AcaaS (Acessibilidade como um Servico).

    /acaas/tts ([in] text/plain; [out] application/json) Servico de Text To Speech (TTS). See TTSResource.
    /acaas/tts/media/{id} ([out] audio/wav*, audio/x-flac) Servico de obtencao de midia do Text To Speech (TTS). See TTSMediaResource.
    /acaas/stt ([in] audio/wav*, audio/x-flac, audio/mpeg; [out] application/json)Servico de Speech To Text (STT). See STTResource.
    /acaas/t2libras ([in] text/plain; [out] application/json) Servico de Text To Libras (T2Libras). See T2LibrasResource.
    /acaas/t2libras/media/{id}([out] video/ogg*, video/mp4, image/jpg) Servico de obtencao de midia do Text To Libras (T2Libras). See LibrasMediaResource.
    /acaas/s2libras ([in] audio/wav*, audio/x-flac, audio/mpeg; [out] application/json)Servico de Speech To Libras (S2Libras). See S2LibrasResource.
    /acaas/s2libras/media/{id}([out] video/ogg*, video/mp4, image/jpg) Servico de obtencao de midia do Speech To Libras (S2Libras).See LibrasMediaResource.
    Author:
    Robson Martins (robson@robsonmartins.com)

    • Method Detail

      • createInboundRoot

        public org.restlet.Restlet createInboundRoot()
        Creates a inbound root Restlet that will receive all incoming calls. In general, instances of Router, Filter or Finder classes will be used as initial application Restlet. The default implementation returns null by default. This method is intended to be overridden by subclasses.
        Overrides:
        createInboundRoot in class org.restlet.Application
        Returns:
        The inbound root Restlet.
